DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether teach intervention help increase use remote monitor patient implantable cardioverter defibrillator .
DOC.brief_title: Barriers Use Remote Monitoring Patients With Implantable Cardioverter Defibrillators
DOC.criteria: Received Medtronic implantable cardioverter defibrillator ( ICD ) Yale Electrophysiology , January 2007 June 2012 ICD compatible Carelink , Medtronic 's remote monitoring system Less 18 year age From vulnerable population Incompetent/suffers dementia NonEnglish speaking
